TestDescription.name: Cross site scripting vulnerability in SimpleViewer
TestDescription.Description: SimpleViewer is a free, customizable image gallery. It allows you to display your images on any web page in a professional and intuitive way. A cross site scripting vulnerability was reported in older versions of the SimpleViewer library that may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary Javascript code.
TestDescription.Impact: Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them. An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user. It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of SimpleViewer.
